revised_title: Lateral Disruptive Force of Electrical Discharge for Calculi Disintegration
tldr: The author explains how the lateral disruptive force of electrical discharge can be used to disintegrate urinary calculi, offering a less invasive alternative to lithotomy. Experiments with various calculi demonstrate the effectiveness of this method, which involves using two parallel wires connected to a Leyden jar to apply the electrical discharge to the surface of the stone.
